name: Unstated
description:
Hey, itch.io!  Welcome to my first solo game!  It's called Unstated, although in the files you will also see the name "Meditation Game" pop up quite a bit, because I'm not very good at planning things ahead of time.

My general thought process was to create a game that showed that no matter how bad the world gets, you can still find peace in it.  Is that an incredibly ambitious goal for basically my first game?  Yep!  Did I succeed?  If you think so, then sure!

As for the gameplay, I tried to simulate meditation to a certain degree.  You really only have one method of interacting with the world, your breath.  The game basically just consists of a single tranquil moment.  Similar vibes as chilling out on the floor with Napstablook in Undertale.

As for actually running the game, simply unzip the zip folder and run the executable. 

Thanks for playing!  I'd appreciate any and all feedback.  Thanks!!
